import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './../ProfileCard/ProfileCard.css' const serverPublic = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER; const ProfileCard = ({location}) => { const {user} =useSelector((state)=>state.authReducer.authData) const {posts} = useSelector((state)=>state.postReducer) console.log(posts,"posts") // const result =Object.keys(posts).map((key)=>[Number(key),posts[key]]); // console.log(result,"result"); return (
{user.firstname} {user.lastname} {user.worksAt ?user.worksAt:"Write About Yourself"}
{user.following.length} Followings
{user.followers.length} Followers
{location === "profilePage" &&( <>
3 Posts
)}
{location ==="profilePage" ? '': My Profile }
) } export default ProfileCard
